PrimEcoSys: North American Warm Desert Active and Stabilized Dune

habitat_description:
This species is found in southwestern Arizona and northwestern Sonora, Mexico. Also found east of the Colorado River and south of the Gila River (Mulcahy et al. 2006). 

The habitats occupied by this species are flat, open, areas of Sonoran Desertscrub. It has also been reported less frequently on rocky bajadas and foothills (Brennan and Holycross 2006). In Arizona, this species is found on the Avra Valley west of Tucson, Yuma desert east of the Colorado River. In Mexico, it is found along coastal areas of Sonora; Bahia Puerto Lobos. Populations are presumably existent in Baja California Norte near Puertecitos (Jones and Lovich 2009).

Found in xeric environments; sands, dunes and Sonoran desertscrub.
